ca.eandb.jmist.framework.job

Class TransferMatrixJob.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.eandb.jmist.framework.job.TransferMatrixJob.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TransferMatrixJob

    public static final class TransferMatrixJob.Builder
extends Object
    A builder for creating TransferMatrixJobs.

    • Field Summary

      static long DEFAULT_SAMPLES_PER_MEASUREMENT
      Default number of samples per measurement.

      Sets a value indicating whether to trace rays in the reverse direction (i.e., from the eye direction).

      Sets the number of samples to use for each measurement (i.e., for each specimen/wavelength pair).

      Sets the number of samples to use for each task.
      TransferMatrixJob.Builder setTasksPerMeasurement(long tasksPerMeasurement)

      • setTasksPerMeasurement

        public TransferMatrixJob.Builder setTasksPerMeasurement(long tasksPerMeasurement)
        Sets the number of samples to use for each task to target the specified number of tasks per measurement. The number of samples per measurement must already have been set.
        Parameters:
        tasksPerMeasurement - The target number of tasks per measurement.
        Returns:
        A reference to this Builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the number of samples per measurement has not been set.
        See Also:
        setSamplesPerMeasurement(long), setSamplesPerTask(long)
